document.full_text: bahrain has stepped up arrests of cyber activists and shi'ites, with more than 300 detained and dozens missing since it launched a crackdown on pro-democracy protests, the opposition said on thursday.
document.title: bahrain steps up arrests of activists: opposition
lines_and_colors: bahrain has stepped up arrests of cyber activists and shi'ites, with more than 300 detained and dozens missing since it launched a crackdown on pro-democracy protests, the opposition said on thursday.
